Articles.Content:
I am looking for new biomes on Kerbin to explore and exploit for science to get up to my next tier, where I plan to launch my Comsat network and Munar probes. I've already reached the northern ice cap, but does the game differentiate science-wise between the northern and southern ice caps? Or is it all the same in the game's code?

Thank you!

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Biomes

Poles are the same biome regardless of if it's north or south. Sorry.
Darn. Well it was worth a shot haha. Probably will still go just to say I did...is the South Pole harder to get to than the North?
Shouldn't be. Might want to aim the other way, of course...not essential but helpful.
Both are just as easy as the other one. Just launch an orbitter in a polar orbit, and deorbit it so you land on 1 of the poles
